channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sterling Order Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sterling Order Management

item.title: CVE-2022-33959|2024-08-03T08:16:15.986Z -- ibm -- sterling%20order%20management
item.description: IBM Sterling Order Management 10.0 could allow a user to bypass validation and perform unauthorized actions on behalf of other users. IBM X-Force ID: 229320.

item.title: CVE-2022-34333|2024-08-03T09:07:16.135Z -- ibm -- sterling%20order%20management
item.description: IBM Sterling Order Management 10.0 does not require that users should have strong passwords by default, which makes it easier for attackers to compromise user accounts. IBM X-Force ID: 229698.

item.title: CVE-2021-20554|2024-08-03T17:45:44.354Z -- ibm -- sterling%20order%20management
item.description: IBM Sterling Order Management 9.4, 9.5, and 10.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 199179.
